title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added a consistent warning about performance issues in GHES versions 3.15, 3.16, and 3.17 to all patch release notes
Replaced existing upgrade instructions with the warning in major release notes (3.15.0, 3.17.0)
Retained existing warnings (e.g., GCP hotpatch issue in 3.15.3) while adding the new performance alert
Fixed trailing whitespace and newline issues in some YAML files

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added a consistent warning about performance issues in GHES versions 3.15, 3.16, and 3.17 to all patch release notes
- Replaced existing upgrade instructions with the warning in major release notes (3.15.0, 3.17.0)
- Retained existing warnings (e.g., GCP hotpatch issue in 3.15.3) while adding the new performance alert
- Fixed trailing whitespace and newline issues in some YAML files
